body: These soft leather boots are incredibly light and comfortable, with thin soles reinforced by strips of tough hide that provide an unexpected amount of support and protection to the foot. On command, these boots allow the wearer to levitate as if she had cast levitate on herself.
name: Boots of Levitation
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Feet/Feet Slot Wondrous Items/Boots of Levitation
